SELECT 'BR' || trim(nvl(max(to_char(to_number(substr(replyNo,3))+1,'000000')),'000001')) as replyNo from reply
union
select nvl(null,'BR000001') as replyNo from dual where not exists (select replyNo from reply)
select replyNo as rno ,content as replyText ,regDate ,updateDate ,boardNo as refNo ,eno ,anonym from reply where boardNo=#{refNo} order by replyNo asc
select eno from employee where name = #{name}
select b.name from reply a, employee b where a.eno = b.eno and a.replyNo = #{rno}
select photo from employee where eno = #{eno}
